title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 358, subpt. 358-5 - THE FAIR HEARING PROCESS
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 358, subpt. 358-5

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 22, 34[3][f], 131[6], 337, 355[3], 390, 424-a, 455, 460-d

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
